attributes.action: Build a Skatepark in Westhoughton, Greater Manchester
attributes.additional_details: I believe a skatepark in Westhoughton would be good because the nearest skatepark is in Bolton town centre, and myself and a few local skaters are fed up of paying £5 a day just to enjoy their sport/ hobby. Additionally, I believe a skatepark would be very beneficial for the local community as it would provide a place for young people to learn new skills, to socialise (in accordance to Covid Rules) and to have fun and exercise in general.
attributes.background: To build a skatepark in my local town, Westhoughton. As a part of Westhoughtons Central Park

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
